meta.title: Quote Results | Hermes Dot Science
meta.description: Your custom AI solution quote from Hermes Dot Science

serviceDescription: This proposal outlines a comprehensive enterprise-grade AI implementation strategy designed to transform your business operations through intelligent automation, data-driven insights, and enhanced customer experiences. Our solution encompasses the complete development lifecycle from initial assessment through deployment, integration, and ongoing maintenance, delivered by our specialized team.

breakdown.title: Detailed Project Breakdown
breakdown.description: Comprehensive overview of all components included in your AI solution

organizational-assessment.title: Organizational Assessment
organizational-assessment.description: A high-level review of your enterprise or agency's structure, team interactions, and existing processes to pinpoint pain points, bottlenecks, and opportunities for AI-driven efficiency gains.

demo-proposal.title: Demo Proposal & Roadmap
demo-proposal.description: A tailored proof-of-concept plan, complete with a MoSCoW prioritization matrix (Must-have, Should-have, Could-have, Won't-have), a phased rollout roadmap, and a ballpark budget estimate to align on scope and expectations.

workflow-analysis.title: Detailed Workflow & Systems Architecture Analysis
workflow-analysis.description: Deep dive into the selected process(es): map end-to-end workflows, data flows, and system dependencies; define security, compliance, and scalability requirements; and produce a technical architecture blueprint.

knowledge-base.title: Knowledge-Base Curation & Input Preparation
knowledge-base.description: Inventory, ingest, and preprocess all relevant data sources—structured, semi-structured, and unstructured—cleaning and organizing content so it can be reliably ingested into your AI models.

implementation.title: Implementation / Development
implementation.description: Build and train your custom AI agent(s), whether a rule-based chatbot, an NLP-driven conversational assistant, a voice interface, or an automated backend workflow, following best practices for security and maintainability.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect the AI agent to your core systems (CRM, ERP, ticketing, custom APIs, on-premise databases, etc.), developing any necessary adapters or middleware to ensure seamless, bi-directional data exchange.

qa.title: Quality Assurance (QA)
qa.description: Execute test plans covering unit tests, integration tests, performance and stress tests, security audits, and—if required—automated regression suites to validate functionality, reliability, and compliance.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Monitoring (KPIs)
maintenance.description: Ongoing support and system monitoring, with dashboards and reports tracking uptime, response accuracy, user satisfaction, cost-savings metrics, and other agreed KPIs; includes model retraining, patching, and performance tuning.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.description: Ready to move forward with your AI solution?

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This quote is automatically generated based on your responses and serves as an initial estimate. The official quote will be provided after our complimentary Organizational Assessment - a free consultation with no commitment required. This assessment helps us understand your specific needs and provide accurate pricing tailored to your organization.

termsCheckbox.before: I acknowledge that I have read and understood the disclaimer above, and I accept the

whatsIncluded.title: What's Included
whatsIncluded.description: Your comprehensive AI solution package includes all of the following

contactForm.title: Confirm Your Details
contactForm.description: Review and confirm your information to proceed with this quote
